article.headline: Amazon.com Inc. stock rises Wednesday, outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% rallied 3.09% to $3,195.69 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 1.74% to 3,419.44 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 1.91% to 28,303.46. Amazon.com Inc. closed $356.56 short of its 52-week high ($3,552.25), which the company achieved on September 2nd. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Wednesday, as Microsoft Corp. MSFT, +2.48% rose 1.90% to $209.83, Alphabet Inc. Cl A GOOGL, +1.82% rose 0.56% to $1,459.14, and Walmart Inc. WMT, +1.00% rose 0.18% to $140.89. Trading volume (4.3 M) remained 456,096 below its 50-day average volume of 4.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
